Files Headings

_baseIsEqual.js

 
var baseIsEqualDeep = require('./_baseIsEqualDeep'),
    isObjectLike = require('./isObjectLike');

The base implementation of _.isEqual which supports partial comparisons and tracks traversed objects.

Params
value The value to compare.
other The other value to compare.
bitmask boolean The bitmask flags. 1 - Unordered comparison 2 - Partial comparison
[customizer] Function The function to customize comparisons.
[stack] Object Tracks traversed value and other objects. 
function baseIsEqual(value, other, bitmask, customizer, stack) {
  if (value === other) {
    return true;
  }
  if (value == null || other == null || (!isObjectLike(value) && !isObjectLike(other))) {
    return value !== value && other !== other;
  }
  return baseIsEqualDeep(value, other, bitmask, customizer, baseIsEqual, stack);
}

module.exports = baseIsEqual;
